pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-5139: User with hub-central-entity-exporter role can't export data
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Added necessary roles and privileges for user with role "hub-central-entity-exporter" to export CSV data. Also correctly renamed a file and added "hub-central-saved-query-user" role to the bertrand user in reference-entity-model.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: As part of this, I think EntitySearchControllerTest needs to be modified to login a user with this role, instead of this role plus 2 other roles.

beforeCommit.message:
DHFPROD-5139: Allow hub-central-entity-exporter to export to CSV

Also correctly renamed a file in reference-entity-model

afterCommit.message:
DHFPROD-5139: Allow hub-central-entity-exporter to export to CSV

Also correctly renamed a file in reference-entity-model

nodes.bodyText:
Instead of adding an extra call to export, we can modify the existing tests to remove "data-hub-operator" and "hub-central-saved-query-user" roles for the first test where we export using query document.
Next, we can add "hub-central-saved-query-user" for login when we test export using queryId which would require for a query to be saved.
